pages.text: $(l)Enchanting$() is a mechanic that augments $(l:combat/armors)armor$(), $(l:tools)tools$(), $(l:combat)weapons$(), and $(l:misc/book)books$() with one or more of a variety of "enchantments" that improve an item's existing abilities or imbue them with additional abilities and uses. A special "glint" animation appears on items that are enchanted.

pages.title: Enchanter
pages.text: $(l)Enchant$() an item at an $(l:utility/enchanting_table)Enchantment Table$()  $(br2)Insert an item in an enchanting table, then apply an enchantment.
